name: Saumya Gurbani
body:
### About
I'm currently a second year medical student in the MD/PhD program at Emory University School of Medicine. This is my GitHub page, where I will upload current and past projects. You can also view some of my prior work by visiting my [Google Scholar page](http://scholar.google.com/citations?user=_hsklg4AAAAJ) and [my blog](http://www.saumya.org).

### M2 Elective
I'm currently working on my second year elective on a project entitled "R[Retrospective Analysis of Time-of-Day vs. Student Performance on Medical School Module Exams](http://code.sgurbani.com/m2elective)". The goal is to determine what effect, if any, do circadian rhythms have on my classmates' performance on our first and second year module exams.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
